text: Kazakhstan competed in the Winter Olympic Games as an independent nation for the first time at the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway. Previously, Kazakhstani athletes competed for the Unified Team at the 1992 Winter Olympics. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Medal !Name !Sport !Event |- | || ||
